question: In April of 1977, who was the Prime Minister of the first place mentioned by name in the Book of Esther (in the New International Version)?

annotator_metadata.Steps:
1. Search the web for “Book of Esther NIV”.
2. Click search result to read the text of the first chapter.
3. Note the first place named, India.
4. Search the web for “prime ministers of India list”.
5. Click Wikipedia result.
6. Scroll down to find the prime minister during the specified timeframe, Morarji Desai.
